Plot_sensitivities¶

This automaticaly plots different sensitivities (predicted errors). You can execute it using ` python Plot_sensitivities.py [data_path] [plot_path] `

scripts.Plot_sensitivities.get_width_height(width_cm=16.58763, aspect=1.6, dpi=300)¶

Get width and height in pixels for a given width in cm.
